name: Just a Random Yandere Game Remake
name_original: Just a Random Yandere Game Remake
description:
This is a remastered version of my first game Just a Random Yandere Game.This time the game is in RPG Maker,is not the best because this is my second game but I hope is Interesting : )

Warning!! This game may contain some sensitive media like blood and strong language (only in a moment) so be careful 

The Gameplay is really short around 2 or 5 minutes with two different endings.

░▒▓█►─═ ᴄᴏɴᴛʀᴏʟs ═─◄█▓▒░

Up, Down, Left, and Right arrows for movement

Z and Enter to interact

X  for menu

Shift For sprint

░▒▓█►─═ ᴄʀᴇᴅɪᴛs ═─◄█▓▒░

Art,characters,story: Nekatakara

Music: Kevin MacLeod
